alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 8:45AM CST until February 01 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau Calcasieu River near White Oak Park ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Glenmora ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier For the Calcasieu River...including Glenmora, Kinder, White Oak Park...Minor to Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Bayou Nezpique...including Basile...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mermentau River...including Mermentau...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 945 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River near Glenmora. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, When the river is falling and the gauge reading is forecast to be near 12 feet, flooding of forested areas near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 12.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CST Tuesday was 12.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Calcasieu River Glenmora 12.0 12.6 Tue 7 am CST 12.5 12.1 11.5 &&
